text: Proportions are what makes the old Greek temples classic in their beauty. They are like huge blocks, from which the air has been literally hewn out between the columns.
author: Arne Jacobsen

text: I am thrilled to be able to bring my vision of beauty to others who may be inspired by it.
author: Carol Alt

text: I'm still figuring out why people would want to look at me. Maybe it's generic beauty, but it's weird to be valued for something I was born with.
author: Josie Maran

text: It's hard to say what drives a three year-old, but I think I had a sense that nature was my solace, and nature was a place in which there was beauty, in which there was order.
author: Story Musgrave

text: It's not fair the emphasis put on beauty, or on sexuality.
author: Rosanna Arquette
